comment: It seems difficult to understand how someone with no corporate experience can critique how memos are constructed in the corporate environment. Her grading rubric is overreaching and lack a solid foundation. It's all very subjective...

PLEASE STAY AWAY. SHE IS VERY HARD AND DOES NOT KNOW WHAT SHE WANTS. I WAS WARNED NOT TO TAKE HER BUT DUE TO SCHOOL SCHEDULE I HAD NOT CHOICE. THE BIGGEST MISTAKE THAT I HAVE DONE. PLEASE SIGN UP WITH ANOTHER TEACHER.
I took her online class. She took weeks to grade any assignment. She gave a zero if one thing was done wrong. She is not a good teacher to take online. It could be better if it was in a classroom.

This was a great professor. I took her online class and it was a very fair class. Her grading is great. She leaves feedback on your papers and is very helpful. I did expect a B in this class but pulled off an A somehow!?
Great teacher.  Hard sometimes but helpful.

Didn't seem to keep up with the class; class was disorganized, assignments at times were vauge; grading doesn't seem to be based on any hard fast rules, just how she's feeling.  Also took very stances for or against papers, which seemed to factor into the grading process.

I took her online course. We wrote 4 papers which wasn't bad at all. She grades fairly and I only had one paper that wasn't an A... it was good but not on subject enough. So make sure you understand what she wants to read. Other than that just watch grammar and have fun! I loved the course

She wasn't a very good teacher. She didn't even read your essays all the way through, and then gave you a C because she completely missed the idea of the paper. Even after I asked her to read it again she said that she wasn't changing my grade, but she couldnt' tell me what my three paragraphs were about. Don't take her unless you want a C.
This class was the best class i had all seimster! She is a awsome teacher and can teach very well. I suggest taking her. She can come off as a hard ass but once you get to know her she great

For an online class, this teacher was never online.  It took her a week to reply to any emails.  She's a tough teacher with high expectations.  Reading material is interesting and she's enthusiastic about the class but isn't quite up to the whole online thing.
Until this class, I hated English.  Now it's the only class I don't skip - and not because it's hard!  Take this class and see for yourself!
She loves group work. Her syllabus is kind of unclear about what she wants all your papers to be on. She is ok but hard!
LOTS of group work in class. She HATES typical 3 point essay. You will have to think outside the box to do well in her class. I would recommend.
